name: Kanlli
tag_list: marketing-strategies, social-influence-marketing, leads, sales, affiliate-marketing, search-engine-marketing, website-development, mobile-marketing, content-generation, marketing-online, social-media-marketing
overview:
If there is one thing that’s constant, it’s change. Constant change is the fixed norm in the world of Marketing and Publicity. Kanlli is a Marketing Agency that helps brands triumph in a world that’s constantly changing.

Our strap line, “REINVENT YOURSELF, EVERYDAY” defines the very culture of our company. It represents the importance of being able to change and adapt to the ever evolving consumer, environment, clients and above all the need to question the solutions and processes established.

We strongly believe in Social Media Campaigns and we work hard to innovate in a business sector which is constantly redefining and revolutionising every day.

Our Marketing expertise can be split into 7 different areas:

  • Conceptualization of Marketing Strategies
  • Social Influence Marketing
  • Leads, Sales and Affiliate Marketing
  • Search Engine Marketing
  • Website Development
  • Mobile Marketing
  • Content Generation

Kanlli is a privately owned company, founded in 2006 by a team pioneering in online sales and communication. Leading the team at Kanlli is Gonzalo Ibáñez, Chief Executive and Pablo López Carral, Sales & Marketing Director, whom have more than 16 years experience each in the world of Interactive Marketing.
